column1: '''''în''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word appearing the [[King's Letter]].<ref name=SD>{{SD
column2: XI2}}, p. 129</ref> The word is commonly understood to be a pronoun meaning "his" (referring to the subject).<ref>{{HM
column3: GS}}, p. 325</ref><ref>[[Didier Willis]], [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] at [http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com] (accessed 20 July 2011)</ref>

column1:
''Ar e aníra ennas suilannad mhellyn '''în''' phain''<ref name=SD/>

==Noldorin==
'''''în''''' is a [[Noldorin]] word meaning year".<ref name=LR>{{LR
